channel.title: Few Quick Questions
channel.description: Alright so I'm working on my forums and I have 2 dumb questions, Alright so when I change the background I want it to be tiles of 1 image, not just 1 big image in the background, and my other question is, how do I add like a custom admin tile under my name? I did the runescape crown tut, so would I just do something similar to do but just replace to code with a different URL image of a status? Admin/mod/donator?

item.title: Few Quick Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Bubbsy7:

I just thought create a forum was the best free available? What other free web hosts and free domains are there?

You can use 000webhost as a web host and DOTTK as a domain.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Quick Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Bubbsy7:

Well I’m pretty new to forums coding and I’m just using createaforum.com which I guess is the new smfforfree? And I was just doing everything out of the admin control panel, Software could help I’m guessing?? Haha

I don’t think you can change the background on the createaforum type websites, if you had installed it on a free webhost with a free domain you would have all the customisation at your fingertips.

For the “tiles” under the username:
Members -> Membergroups -> Edit Membergroups -> Modify -> Then edit the url to the star image filename.

Read full topic
